scene_description_enriched: A man wearing a blue tunic, dark leggings, and a white turban is depicted in profile, actively engaged in harvesting a large pile of golden grain with a scythe. The scene is framed within a decorative quatrefoil motif against a red background adorned with small, stylized floral patterns. The ground beneath the man is rendered in green, suggesting an agricultural setting. The overall composition is part of a larger illuminated manuscript, indicated by the decorative border elements.
